DataElement.preferredName: Intraarterial Route of Administration Melphalan Administered Yes No Unable to Assess Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to the injection of Melphalan within an artery or arteries.:The preferred value domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unable to assess.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intraarterial Route of Administration Melphalan Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the injection of Melphalan within an artery or arteries.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Administration within an artery or arteries.

Concepts.definition: The administration of a substance directly into an artery.

Property.preferredDefinition: An orally available phenylalanine derivative of nitrogen mustard with antineoplastic activity. Melphalan alkylates DNA at the N7 position of guanine and induces DNA inter-strand cross-linkages, resulting in the inhibition of DNA and RNA synthesis and cytotoxicity against both dividing and non-dividing tumor cells. (NCI04):The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A phenylalanine derivative of nitrogen mustard with antineoplastic activity. Melphalan alkylates DNA at the N7 position of guanine and induces DNA inter-strand cross-linkages, resulting in the inhibition of DNA and RNA synthesis and cytotoxicity against both dividing and non-dividing tumor cells.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unable to Assess Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred value domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unable to assess.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Aspects of the context prevent the evaluation needed to determine a value.

Concepts.definition: Aspects of the context prevent the evaluation needed to determine a value.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
